page.title: 20The Authors
page.content: This survey was written by the children of{COLERNE PRIMARY SCHOOL}and involved many field trips and many hours of hard work These are their names: Jessica Adams, Katie Bence, Nicola McSheffrey, Claire Rix, Georgina Rowley, Nicola Potter, Andrew Dain, Christopher Lewington, Paul Manns, Brian Monk, Jason Smith, Lee Smith,Tara Barton,Helen Bond,Emma Brierley,Elizabeth Brookes,Nina Cliffe, Paula John, Debbie Knight, Andrea Pickard, Emma Rodell, Ann Shaw, Samantha Smart, Jayne Steer, Natasha Waite, Paul Bambrough, Andrew Battley, Mark Beaton, Alex Morton, Michael Phillips, Stuart Downes. Some editing was done by Mr.Richard Selby, and "A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A HOUSEWIFE"was contributed by Mrs.J.Brookes.
